entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:27 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 12:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
